text:
Tanya Weinreis, a Montana coffee shop owner, speaks at the #RNCConvention2020 about how the PPP loan she received from the Trump administration helped keep her business afloat. 

While the program helped small businesses, it was also racked with scandal. https://t.co/LwGaas4C4U
